title: ranked/afkers
body: now i play a fair amount of rank because i love league but lately i have been put off because of feeders and people who dc. now i would like to ask why has league not made it that if someone dc in your game instead of losing points make it that we lose none or not as much. Im getting tired of playing and losing just because someone dc and that is pretty much game lost yea they will get reported but im still losing alot of points for something i did't do or plan to happen i just think its unfair for other players. so can league do something about this because i don't know how much more i can take before i just stop playing ranked. As it is in oceania not many people play rank and auto fill was made which makes even more games lost because people get roles they can't play. if you make it we lose no point and if we have an dc your problem thinking team mates will go and dc to help keep there team mates from not losing points. just make it who ever goes and dc loses more points like 25 or even 30 and it should stop it.
